languages.text: В слегка расклиненные створки саркофага протиснут изломанный металлический палец. Он слабо шевелится.
A broken metallic finger sticks out from between the sarcophagus doors that are slightly ajar. It wriggles weakly.
languages.original_text: В слегка расклиненные створки саркофага протиснут изломанный металлический палец. Он слабо шевелится.

traits.locale_text: A broken metallic finger sticks out in-between the slightly opened sarcophagus doors. It moves slightly.
A broken metallic finger sticks out in-between the slightly opened sarcophagus doors. It moves slightly.
A broken metallic finger sticks out in between the slightly opened sarcophagus doors. It is moving slightly.
A broken metallic finger sticks out in between the slightly opened sarcophagus doors. It is moving slightly.
A broken metallic finger sticks out from between the sarcophagus doors that are slightly ajar. It wriggles weakly.
A broken metallic finger sticks out from between the sarcophagus doors that are slightly ajar. It wriggles weakly.

languages.text: Dépassant entre les portes entrouvertes du sarcophage, un doigt métallique brisé remue faiblement.
languages.original_text: A broken metallic finger sticks out from between the sarcophagus doors that are slightly ajar. It wriggles weakly.

traits.locale_text: Un doigt métallique brisé dépasse entre les portes entrouvertes du sarcophage. Il remue légèrement.

languages.text: Un dedo metálico roto sobresale entre las puertas entreabiertas del sarcófago. Se retuerce débilmente.
languages.original_text: A broken metallic finger sticks out from between the sarcophagus doors that are slightly ajar. It wriggles weakly.

traits.locale_text: Un dedo metálico roto sobresale entre las puertas entreabiertas del sarcófago. Se mueve ligeramente.

languages.text: 微微打开的棺柩之中，伸出了一根断裂的金属手指，无力地蠕动着。
languages.original_text: A broken metallic finger sticks out from between the sarcophagus doors that are slightly ajar. It wriggles weakly.

traits.locale_text: 断裂的金属手指从微微打开的棺柩中伸出来，慢慢地移动着。

languages.text: わずかに開いた棺の蓋の間から折れた金属製の指が突き出ている。それは、かすかに動いている。
languages.original_text: A broken metallic finger sticks out from between the sarcophagus doors that are slightly ajar. It wriggles weakly.

traits.locale_text: わずかに開いた棺の蓋の間から折れた金属製の指が突き出ている。それは、かすかに動いている。

languages.text: Ein gebrochener metallischer Finger ragt zwischen den leicht geöffneten Türen des Sarcophagus' heraus. Er wackelt schwach.
languages.original_text: A broken metallic finger sticks out from between the sarcophagus doors that are slightly ajar. It wriggles weakly.

traits.locale_text: Ein gebrochener metallischer Finger ragt zwischen den leicht geöffneten Türen des Sarcophagus' heraus. Er bewegt sich leicht.

languages.text: Aralık lahit kapılarının arasından kırık bir metal parmak, dışarı fışkırıyor. Güçsüzce kıpırdanıyor.
languages.original_text: A broken metallic finger sticks out from between the sarcophagus doors that are slightly ajar. It wriggles weakly.
